Title: Requires the department of agriculture and markets to develop and maintain a database on the impact of climate change on agriculture
Summary: Requires the department of agriculture and markets to develop and maintain a database on the impact of climate change on agriculture; requires farmers to report to the department on the impact of climate change on agriculture, including but not limited to crops grown, outcomes and yield.
LawCode: Amd ยง16, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring the department of agriculture and markets to develop and maintain a database on the impact of climate change on agriculture
